mapper.select: SELECT POST_ID, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, VIEW_CNT, ANS_CNT FROM quoationInquiry ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quoationInquiry (USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE quoationInquiry SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE POST_ID = #{postId}
